start_information: Your working directory is the local digitizer repository!
add_number: Add number to the file name of the created template file
cropped_maps: Important! Save the cropped map in
detect_maps: High threshold values will lead to few detections, low values to many detections. Start with the threshold value 0.4 and keep decreasing it until all the outputs are extracted. The minimum possible output value will be 0.2.
